description:
Tomoharu and the others spend their summer vacation working at a seaside pension. Tomoharu`s heart is heavy with the secret of the burial doll, but that doesn`t stop Higuchi and An from scheming to hook up Kanade and Tomoharu by sending them to legendary love spot Kuremizaki fortress observatory under the guise of a test of courage. Meanwhile, Misao`s unhappy that Tomoharu is keeping a secret from her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 自由で不自由な選択肢
